content: lacy fans shawl skill level intermediate size approx 18 wide x 60 long materials 700 yds worsted wt yarn sample shown in caron color match size k/10 5 6 50 mm crochet hook or size needed to achieve gauge tapestry needle gauge in pattern 2 fans = 7 6 row = 5 on size k/10 5 6 50 mm hook pattern notes although photos show orientation of stitch pattern as one-directional instructions have been written to work shawl from center back outward so that the stitch pattern runs in the proper direction on each end of the shawl special stitches fan = treble_crochet chain 2 treble_crochet 4 times terms/abbreviations beginning beg chain chain double_crochet double_crochet hook hk repeat repeat single_crochet single_crochet skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch space space stitch st triple crochet treble_crochet shawl 1 first half row 1 rs beg at center back of shawl chain 57 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hk *chain 1 skip 4 chain in next chain work treble_crochet chain 2 treble_crochet 4x fan completed chain 1 skip 4 chain single_crochet in next chain repeat from * to last 5 chain chain 1 skip 4 chain in last chain work treble_crochet chain 2 twice treble_crochet in same chain turn 5 full fans one half fan row 2 chain 1 single_crochet in same st at base of chain-1 *chain 3 skip next chain-2 space double_crochet in next chain-2 space ** chain 2 skip next treble_crochet-single_crochet-treble_crochet double_crochet in first chain-2 space of next fan chain 3 single_crochet in center treble_crochet of fan repeat from * ending last repeat at ** chain 1 treble_crochet in last single_crochet turn row 3 chain 7 in first chain-1 space work treble_crochet chain 2 treble_crochet chain 1 skip chain-3 space single_crochet in next single_crochet *chain 1 skip chain-3 space fan in next chain-2 space chain 1 skip next chain-3 space single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * to end turn 5 full fans one half fan row 4 chain 6 double_crochet in first chain-2 space chain 3 single_crochet in center treble_crochet of fan *chain 3 skip next chain-2 space double_crochet in next chain-2 space chain 2 skip next treble_crochet-single_crochet-treble_crochet double_crochet in next chain-2 space chain 3 single_crochet in center treble_crochet of fan repeat from * ending last repeat with single_crochet in 3rd chain of turning chain turn row 5 chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet chain 1 skip first chain-3 space fan in next chain-2 space chain 1 skip next chain-3 space *single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 skip next chain-3 space fan in next chain-2 space chain 1 skip next chain-3 space repeat from * to last single_crochet single_crochet in single_crochet chain 1 skip next chain-3 space in 3rd chain of turning chain work treble_crochet chain 2 treble_crochet chain 2 treble_crochet turn 5 full fans 1 half fan repeat row 2-5 until piece measures approx 30 from beg ending with row 2 fasten_off second half working on opposite side of foundation chain attach yarn to first chain at right-side edge of piece
